title: $:/plugins/tg/ro
text:
{ "tiddlers": { "$:/plugins/tg/ro/advanced-search-button-style": { "created": "20150519114003182", "text": "/* Hide advanced search button */ .tc-image-advanced-search-button.tc-image-button { padding-left: 15px; }", "type": "text/css", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/advanced-search-button-style", "tags": "$:/tags/advanced-search-button", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20220305193957578", "creator": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/help": { "created": "20140716184603499", "text": "!! Help !!! Before you 'publish' your ~TiddlyWiki: # Make a backup of your wiki # Get a defined start-up situation for your TW: #* Define your starting tiddler(s) in [[$:/DefaultTiddlers]] #* If required, define the state of the sidebar tabs #* If required create a tiddler (e.g. `xyz`) which transcludes $:/plugins/tg/ro/publish to create another option to return from readonly to edit mode #* If required change the keyboard shortut (Ctrl-Shift-Alt-P) for opening $:/plugins/tg/ro/publish via Control Panel > Keyboard Shortcuts # Follow the procedure given in the tabs next to the 'Help' tab # Save in tab Save with the special save button: @@.BLUE ''Save'' @@ <$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/ro/save-button"/> # Reload your wiki !!! There are a few ways to return from readonly to edit mode: # Press the configured keyboard shortcut (default Ctrl-Shift-Alt-P), which opens $:/plugins/tg/ro/publish # If `xyz` has been defined, start the TW with `#xyz` appended which opens $:/plugins/tg/ro/publish # Search for (although invisible, advanced search <> is still available!): #* ''Publish'' to get to $:/plugins/tg/ro/publish #* ''~ControlPanel'' to get to ''$:/ControlPanel > Appearance > Publish'' <<< ''Note:''
@@.RED Although you can hide the 'Sidebar' and 'Advanced Search' button, they remain 'active'!@@ <<< ", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/help", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20230826150234818", "creator": "TonGerner", "caption": "Help" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/hide-sidebar-buttons": { "created": "20161108100124814", "text": "!! Show/hide sidebar buttons Uncheck to hide the appropriate sidebar button |Button |visible |note |h |Sidebar button (<>/<>) | <$checkbox tiddler="$:/core/ui/TopBar/menu" tag="$:/tags/TopRightBar"/> | 1 | |Advanced search button (<>) | <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/ro/advanced-search-button-style" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet" invertTag="yes"/> | 1 | |Publish button (<>) | <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/ro/publish-button" tag="$:/tags/TopRightBar"/> | 2 | <<< ''Note:'' # Although 'invisible' when unchecked (`display:none;`), ''Sidebar'' and ''Advanced search'' buttons stay active! # The ''Publish'' button when unchecked will be invisible and inactive (`$:/tags/TopRightBar` removed) <<<", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/hide-sidebar-buttons", "tags": "", "modified": "20210107191637449", "caption": "Sidebar buttons" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/hide-sidebar-tabs": { "created": "20161108100017749", "text": "\define check() <$checkbox tag="$:/tags/SideBar" checked="$:/tags/SideBar" unchecked="$:/tags/hide" default="$:/tags/SideBar" checkactions="""<$action-deletefield tags/><$action-setfield tags="$:/tags/SideBar"/>""" uncheckactions="""<$action-deletefield tags/><$action-setfield tags="$:/tags/hide"/>""" <$link to={{!!title}}>  <$transclude field="caption"> <$view field="title"/> \end !! Show/hide sidebar tabs Uncheck to hide the appropriate sidebar tab <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/SideBar]]">
<> <$list filter="[tag[$:/tags/hide]]">
<> ", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/hide-sidebar-tabs", "tags": "", "modified": "20210107191602630", "caption": "Sidebar tabs" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/hide-toolbar-buttons": { "created": "20161108095713019", "text": "!! Hide toolbar buttons Disable in Control panel (Appearance > Toolbars) the buttons you do not need in read-only mode. ''//Disable at least the following buttons://'' * ~ViewToolbar ** Edit button <> ** More button <> ** Info button <> (Tools tab contains button configuration!) * Page control buttons ** New tiddler button <> ** Control panel button <> ** Save button <> ** More button <> {{$:/language/ControlPanel/Toolbars/Hint}}
<>
", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/hide-toolbar-buttons", "tags": "", "modified": "20210107191535082", "caption": "Buttons" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/icon": { "created": "20170322100000766", "text": "", "type": "image/svg+xml", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/icon", "tags": "", "modified": "20191230134918451" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/images/publish": { "created": "20170322105731731", "text": "", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/images/publish", "tags": "", "modified": "20191230134946688" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/license": { "created": "20180124175202510", "text": "[[Readonly plugin|http://www.tongerner.nl/TW5/TW5_playground.html]] © Ton Gerner — 2018-2023 MIT License: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT ", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/license", "tags": "", "modified": "20221228162107587" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/publish": { "created": "20140715185723459", "text": "\define icn(icon) \end !! Readonly plugin <> ", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/publish", "tags": "$:/tags/ControlPanel/Appearance", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20220305210932183", "creator": "TonGerner", "caption": "Publish" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/publish-button": { "created": "20170506162930803", "text": "<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Publish read-only"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-open-window" $param="$:/plugins/tg/ro/publish" height="700px" width="550px"/> {{$:/plugins/tg/ro/images/publish}} ", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/publish-button", "tags": "$:/tags/publish-button $:/tags/TopRightBar", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191231184447737", "list-before": "$:/core/ui/TopBar/menu", "creator": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/readme": { "text": "A plugin to make ~TiddlyWiki read-only. You can hide: * ''All'' toolbar buttons * 'Sidebar' button (to switch Sidebar) and 'Advanced search' button (next to Search) * All Sidebar tabs tagged with $:/tags/SideBar. Click the Publish button <> next to the sidebar button <>/<> to start making your TW 'publish-ready'. A new window with six tabs opens. Read the Help tab and follow the 5 steps. <<< ''Note:''
@@.RED Although you can hide the 'Sidebar' button and 'Advanced Search' button, they remain 'active'!@@ <<< There are a few ways to return from readonly to edit mode, see [[Help|$:/plugins/tg/ro/help]]. ", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/readme", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20200319200627098", "creator": "TonGerner", "created": "20140821172500339" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/save": { "created": "20161108100434387", "text": "!!Save {{$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Saving}}
@@.BLUE ''Save'' @@ <$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/ro/save-button" mode="block"/> ", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/save", "tags": "", "modified": "20230826182512353", "caption": "Save" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/save-button": { "created": "20170405200808621", "text": "\whitespace trim <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/SaveWiki/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/SaveWiki/Caption}} class=<>> <$wikify name="site-title" text={{$:/config/SaveWikiButton/Filename}}> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-save-wiki" $param={{$:/config/SaveWikiButton/Template}} filename=<>/> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/plugins/tg/ro/images/save-button}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/SaveWiki/Caption}}/> ", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/save-button", "tags": "", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20230826182325033", "creator": "TonGerner", "caption": "{{$:/core/images/save-button-dynamic}} {{$:/language/Buttons/SaveWiki/Caption}}", "description": "{{$:/language/Buttons/SaveWiki/Hint}}" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/sidebar-button-style": { "created": "20140715185800387", "text": "/* Hide sidebar button */ svg.tc-image-chevron-left { display: none; } svg.tc-image-chevron-right { display: none; } ", "type": "text/css", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/sidebar-button-style", "tags": "$:/tags/sidebar-button", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191230135322974", "creator": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/sidebar-layout": { "created": "20170307110734575", "text": "\define lingo-base() $:/language/ThemeTweaks/ Sidebar layout: <$select tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/options/sidebarlayout"> ", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/sidebar-layout", "tags": "", "modified": "20191230135338759" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/styles": { "created": "20161104132710834", "text": "/* Styles for clean/dirty */ html body svg.tgc-image-save-button-dynamic .tgc-image-save-button-dynamic-clean { visibility: visible; } html body svg.tgc-image-save-button-dynamic .tgc-image-save-button-dynamic-dirty { visibility: hidden; } html body.tc-dirty svg.tgc-image-save-button-dynamic .tgc-image-save-button-dynamic-clean { visibility: hidden; } html body.tc-dirty svg.tgc-image-save-button-dynamic .tgc-image-save-button-dynamic-dirty { visibility: visible; } html body.tc-dirty span.tc-dirty-indicator, html body.tc-dirty span.tc-dirty-indicator svg { fill: <>; color: <>; } /* Slider style */ html .tgc-slider { color: #5778D8; font-weight: bold; } .tgc-slider:hover { color: #5778D8; text-decoration: underline; } .tgc-sldrbg { background-color: #F7FAFF; } .RED { color: red; font-weight: bold; } .BLUE { color: blue; font-weight: bold; }", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/styles", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "modified": "20230826153546891", "type": "text/css", "list-after": "$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/base" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/shortcut/publish": { "created": "20200317164804429", "text": "<$navigator story="$:/StoryList"> <$action-navigate $to="$:/plugins/tg/ro/publish"/> ", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/shortcut/publish", "tags": "$:/tags/KeyboardShortcut", "modified": "20200317185519894", "key": "((publish))" }, "$:/config/ShortcutInfo/publish": { "created": "20200317164006337", "text": "Open Publish window", "title": "$:/config/ShortcutInfo/publish", "tags": "", "modified": "20200317164305031" }, "$:/config/shortcuts/publish": { "created": "20200317164439679", "text": "ctrl-shift-alt-P", "title": "$:/config/shortcuts/publish", "modified": "20200318102428021" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/settings": { "created": "20161108100322449", "text": "!! Dropzone <$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/DragAndDrop/Enable" field="text" checked="no" unchecked="yes" default="yes" disabled> Check to disable dropzone <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/config/DragAndDrop/Enable" text="no"/>
!! Settings To customise the behaviour of TiddlyWiki {{$:/snippets/viewswitcher}} {{$:/plugins/tg/ro/sidebar-layout}} {{$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings}} ", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/settings", "tags": "", "modified": "20230826183628316", "caption": "Settings" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/macros": { "created": "20220305165543112", "text": "\define icn(icon) \end \define sldr(label tiddler class) <$set name="revealState" value=<>> <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="yes"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tgc-slider" set=<> setTo="yes"> $label$ ▷ <$reveal type="match" state=<> text="yes"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tgc-slider" set=<> setTo="no"> $label$ ▽ <$reveal type="match" state=<> text="yes">
<$transclude tiddler="$tiddler$" mode="block" />
\end ", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/macros", "modified": "20230826151559359", "code-body": "yes" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/images/advanced-search": { "created": "20220305164309063", "text": "", "tags": "", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/images/advanced-search", "modified": "20220305164357244" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/images/save": { "created": "20140715185836189", "text": "", "creator": "TonGerner", "modified": "20220305195942991", "modifier": "TonGerner", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/images/save" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/images/save-button": { "created": "20221228162607346", "text": "\parameters (size:"22pt") ", "tags": "", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/images/save-button", "modified": "20230826182116301" } } }
author: TonGerner
name: TW readonly
